snippet.title: Opera Nova - Oculus Rift GamePlay & Review
snippet.description:
Opera Nova is a musical journey inspired by Disney’s Fantasia. Only this time instead of 2D animation, Opera Nova immerses the user in a fantastic world of 3D color and sound.

Developers Info:
Website: http://www.unellodesign.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/aaronlemke

My Social Networks: :
Twitter: http://bit.ly/24v3pav
FaceBook: http://bit.ly/1UuLLAL
